/*
Right now, mobs.update() updates every mob even if they aren't being drawn. Is this a problem?

Intro section:
- Floating cubes, drifting upward
- Rotating heart, not beating
- Camera pans slowly
- More cubes appear out of air with each piano chord

Intro to Lyrics riser:
- Increase floating cubes' rotation speeds and upward speeds
- Increase heart's rotation speed
- When the first stab hits, shrink all remaining cubes

Lyric section "Building ... I thought we were better":
- Stabs:
	- Cubes appear out of air
- Lyrics:
	- Cubes assemble into building

Lyric section "We can try ... and we can feel nothing":
- The tower that was just built breaks up and cubes fly away
- 

Lyric section "And I know ... help me to break through":

Melody section: 
- Stabs:
	- Cut to separate scene of three buildings exploding in succession
- Notes:
	- Spinning cube lasers
- Slowly rotating scene of the heart inside a castle

Pulses:
- 

Melody section 2: 
- Stabs:
	- Cut to separate scene of three buildings exploding in succession
- Notes:
	- Spinning cube lasers
- Slowly rotating scene of the heart inside a castle

Pulses 2:
- 

Lyric section "We can try ... help me to break through":
- 4x piano notes:
	- Cube lasers appearing out of air
- The heart is fixed, everything else is moving away from the camera into the distance
- Buildings being built or dismantled pass by with each beat

Lyric section "Moving pictures ... Just let it consume us":
- Similar to intro
*/
